data.name: Selecting Driver

data.message: X "docker version --format {{.Server.Os}}-{{.Server.Version}}:{{.Server.Platform.Name}}" exit status 1: permission denied while trying to connect to the Docker daemon socket at unix:///var/run/docker.sock: Get "http://%2Fvar%2Frun%2Fdocker.sock/v1.44/version": dial unix /var/run/docker.sock: connect: permission denied
* Suggestion: Add your user to the 'docker' group: 'sudo usermod -aG docker $USER && newgrp docker'
X Exiting due to MK_USAGE: Ensure your Docker is running and is healthy.
